casebody.data:
EARL S. WORSHAM, TRADING AS WORSHAM BROTHERS, v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 44070] [103 C. Cls. 378

326 U. S. —]

Government contract; certificate of Government agent not supported by the evidence is not binding on the Court of Claims. Petition dismissed.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court October 8, 1945.
